column5: Hi everyone,  I caught a crappie this weekend with a tag on, and the tag has "S.S.F.C" and a number on it. Did a little bit googling, "S.S.F.C" stands for "Sir Sandford Fleming College". I understand that when a fish is caught with M.N.R tag, then I should report it to M.N.R. But, since this is a "S.S.F.C" tag, should I report it to "S.S.F.C"?  Thanks,  Alex
I would think it would be the Lindsay campus you would want to contact.
To narrow it down a bit, the Lindsay campus is likely where the tagging was done.  Edit: Ya, what ^he^ said.
Thanks for the replies. I will give S.S.F.C Lindsay campus a call this week.  Alex
